title: So I browsed through the Boards, Subreddits, and Youtube comments of those defending Tyler1.
body:
Some common things I noticed:

1. "OTHER PEOPLE DID ACCOUNT BUYING/BOOSTING/ETC TOO THEREFORE THAT MAKES IT OKAY"
2. _someone tries to reason with a fanboy about why Tyler1 got banned_ → "NO F*** YOU F***** R***** LITTLE DIPS***"/etc.
3. "HE'S POPULAR THEREFORE HE'S IMMUNE TO BEING BANNED FOR BEING AN ASSHOLE"
4. "OTHER PEOPLE STARTED SHITTALKING THEREFORE IT MAKES IT OKAY TO SHITTALK BACK"
5. "HE'S REFORMED, PRETEND HE DOESN'T HAVE LIKE 20 PERMABANNED ACCOUNTS"
6. "HE'S NOT TOXIC HE'S JUST NORMAL" ( uh, wtf, that's even worse )
7. "I LIKED HIS STREAMS THEREFORE IT MAKES IT OKAY"
etc etc.

Seriously?
The only thing you're doing is making yourselves look bad.

EDIT: Oh look, the fanboys are back.

replies.body:
I would just like to point out that i upvoted your thread.

That is all.
My thoughts exactly.
Me as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Shac Norris,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-30T19:19:05.104+0000)
>
> I would just like to point out that i upvoted your thread.
> 
> That is all.

Likewise here.
same

3. "HE'S POPULAR THEREFORE HE'S IMMUNE TO BEING BANNED FOR BEING AN ASSHOLE"
I laughed because I literally had no idea who this kid was until he got banned. I'm a Draven player who likes to look at other Draven mains, but I literally had no idea he existed.
And I'm here not watching LCS at all because I would rather play then watch. That's probably why I am still Bronze!

You should give watching the lcs a try at least once. I had the same attitude till i casually watched some games and ive picked up a ton of little tricks that improved my game. Still dont play ranked though, rip solo q :<

Oh, don't get me wrong. I have watched some LCS tournaments, and I always watch the last one of the season since I started at League two years ago. I have learned things from them, my problem is I just get bored and stop paying attention. I find it way easier to become engrossed playing games (any type of game) then watching them. The only type of actual League *watching* I can tolerate well is people who compile comedic stuff like Wood Division Adventures or Darkk Mane. To be honest my placement in Ranked would probably improve if I just played Ranked, but I haven't even finished my promos this year and I have already played well over 100 games on Summoner's Rift alone. I just have never enjoyed Ranked, as I have never had good experiences with it.

Personally I wouldn't recommend watching LCS if your idea is getting better. If you want to examine their mechanics, it's fine, their mechanics are near-perfect relative to the rest of the players of this game, but I believe game knowledge and knowing what to do when is more important, and to be perfectly honest, LCS doesn't accurately depict your average ranked game. Watching someone who just plays ranked games can be both more enjoyable and probably teach you more useful lessons if your goal is climbing.

> [{quoted}](name=PeponiPoro,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2016-05-01T03:00:03.844+0000)
>
> And I'm here not watching LCS at all because I would rather play then watch. That's probably why I am still Bronze!

To be honest, I play worse after watching guides, streams, and LCS games because I end up thinking I actually have a team that follows up or takes advantage of opportunities with split-second decision making. When I start to remember that I can only rely on myself, I start winning again.
Yes because what you're saying is true, thats totally how everyone responded! Fucking downvoted.
Yes because "common things" means every single one of them. Good job outing yourself though.
What is so wrong about liking a streamer and defending a streamer you happen to enjoy?

Just because people like him, doesn't mean his behavior is okay.

 That's like saying Donald Trump's sexism and racism is defendable because some people like him (hint: it's not okay to be toxic no matter what)

> [{quoted}](name=Celestial Bodied,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2016-04-30T20:36:23.311+0000)
>
> Just because people like him, doesn't mean his behavior is okay.
> 
>  That's like saying Donald Trump's sexism and racism is defendable because some people like him (hint: it's not okay to be toxic no matter what)

k you don't need to bring politics in here lol

Thats exactly what you misunderstood.
He/She is not talking about Donald Trump as a politician, but as a person. 
DT abuses offending rethoric to get attention as a _politian_ and that seems to be one of the reasons why people think it's okay. It's not, because as a _person_ he needs to respect the ground rules and conventions of our society.
Everyone always poops on the White Knights of the internet for wanting some amount of civility. +1 Internets

Because you defend a streamer that is a rager.

Ill give you an analogy.

A famous singer kill someone, and people defend him because he was a famous singer.


See how stupid that is?

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-04-30T20:35:48.693+0000)
>
> Because you defend a streamer that is a rager.
> 
> Ill give you an analogy.
> 
> A famous singer kill someone, and people defend him because he was a famous singer.
> 
> 
> See how stupid that is?

How does klling someone and sometimes being toxic even fit in the same group. And also I don't really care if he's toxic, if he's entertaining then I will watch him. If he makes he laugh I will watch him his behavior has nothing to do as to why I like him

Its an analogy. Jesus.

And if being toxic and trolling is entertaining for you.........

Also, his behavior might not influence you (Because you seem to be in the same opinion that raging = good and fun) but it does others.

This game has rules.

If you cant obey the rules, dont play. Just because you stream you do not get an exeption. 

Also, he got 19 permabans! Jesus!

I think brain cells actually died in pain over the level of stupid in the logic the guy you're responding to exhibits. If they were intelligent they wouldn't be Tyler1 fans. Just give up and quit feeding the troll, you can't fix stupid, and you'll never learn anything of value from their responses.
As they say, you can't argue with idiots because they are too idiotic to see how idiotic they are.
Like the O. J. Simpson murder case? He still got away tho....
If the glove fits.
It's the hypocrisy that pisses me off. Tyler1 deserves his punishment. Yet Kacytron/Meteos/Incarnation have done the same or worse (looking at you Jensen).

> [{quoted}](name=Retillin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-04-30T20:27:06.929+0000)
>
> It's the hypocrisy that pisses me off. Tyler1 deserves his punishment. Yet Kacytron/Meteos/Incarnation have done the same or worse (looking at you Jensen).

Do they have over 15 perma banned accounts? If not then they didn't do the same or worse.

that fail logic lol.

he just called riot hypocrits for uneven treatments. so why are you looking at riots end results (number of banned accounts) to justify riots uneven treatments?

if anything your post shows that riot has been treating people differently. tyler gets a bunch of banned accounts, other players have 0 banned accounts after toxic activity.

if you don't know how to think and construct your argument, don't talk. it's just embarrassing to read.

> [{quoted}](name=EboybiterKDA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=000400030001,timestamp=2016-05-01T09:25:53.856+0000)
>
> that fail logic lol.
> 
> he just called riot hypocrits for uneven treatments. so why are you looking at riots end results (number of banned accounts) to justify riots uneven treatments?
> 
> if anything your post shows that riot has been treating people differently. tyler gets a bunch of banned accounts, other players have 0 banned accounts after toxic activity.
> 
> if you don't know how to think and construct your argument, don't talk. it's just embarrassing to read.

The only one who is embarrassing himself is you and the other Tyler fanboys. They are probably toxic but considering what I've seen Tyler is much worse, plus they not being banned isn't justification for him being pardoned for the twentieth time. Also consider that he was reported by other master players, so after a while the system banned him, but when it progressed to a perma ban, then Riot reviews it personally so he doesn't get banned by mistake, which I am certain wasn't one.

that fail logic again lol. I didnt say who deserves a ban or not cupcake. I said there is uneven treatment. is that hard to read? why you talking about "they not being banned isn't justification for him being pardoned for the twentieth time."
where the hell am i saying he should be pardoned?

fail logic is so fail.

> [{quoted}](name=EboybiterKDA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=00040003000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-01T14:48:49.104+0000)
>
> that fail logic again lol. I didnt say who deserves a ban or not cupcake. I said there is uneven treatment. is that hard to read? why you talking about "they not being banned isn't justification for him being pardoned for the twentieth time."
> where the hell am i saying he should be pardoned?
> 
> fail logic is so fail.

Why did you bring them up then? They have nothing to do with him, fanboys only mention them to pardon him, they are a completely different matter cupcake. Go make a thread about them this is about that retard Tyler who shouldn't be allowed to play any online game again.

Incarnation was banned for over a year tho (maybe more, I forget).

Honestly Kacytron and Meteos should get similar treatment soon if they don't shape up.
Sorry, I was wondering, what has Meteos done? All I know of was him saying he didn't want any tyler1 fans to be his fans.

https://mobile.twitter.com/Prototype_Vayne/status/718529484509421569

May not work since I'm on my phone but this is what every Tyler1 supporter is quoting.
Not arguing with you, but every single one of Tyler's games are worse than that lmao

That is an overstatement. People make Tyler out to be this constant rager. Some games he doesn't chat anything, some games he's actually encouraging, some games he's too focused on his own play.  And, in some games he's just passive aggressive rather than straight salty or hating.

Ok, fine, I used a hyperbole to prove my point, sorry on that.

Regardless though, the way he presented him self and acted just spoke out rager. It's hard to find one of his videos on YouTube where he's not talking shit or raging. It's generally one or the other, neither being good for the environment of the game.  My only problem with passive aggressive is that many times I see it as just as bad, it's an awkward state where both sides are secretly hating each other and can't say it, a state of staleness. Sure, some games he doesn't type in chat, but because he's recording people can still see what he's saying. If someone of your team just made a bad play and you pm your duo partner or talk trash out of game then it's generally ok. But if you do that while recording people can see you shit talking, and what they can see is what matters.

Dunno, his good games to bad is like (let's say) Meteos' bad to good. A bucket of water in a wildfire doesn't do much.

> [{quoted}](name=KOC rule,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=00040000000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-01T02:23:16.035+0000)
>
> Not arguing with you, but every single one of Tyler's games are worse than that lmao

I know, I think it's absurd that they are calling out for a Meteos ban. Don't get me wrong, what Meteos said was not right at all, but one instance like this is not permaban worthy.
Yea, it's questionable as to whether that needs a punishment or not, one bad game doesn't mean a bad player. A set of some 19 bans (maybe accounts) on the other hand.
k that's not even close to the same level as feeding intentionally every other game nice try

> [{quoted}](name=Monado II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LfJJKtQa,comment-id=00040000000100000001,timestamp=2016-05-01T02:51:39.789+0000)
>
> k that's not even close to the same level as feeding intentionally every other game nice try

I know, I think it's absurd that they are calling out for a Meteos ban.  Don't get me wrong, what Meteos said was not right at all, but one instance like this is not permaban worthy.

Its also out of context. Is that his friend? A lot of people he play with behave "troll-like" and speak that way. Just listen to him and sneaky when they talk together on stream. If he typed that, that could be a friend. If it wasn't and they reported, he would have gotten a chat restriction, *at least.* Unless it was one singular moment.
Context doesn't matter.
Context does matter. Joking around with friends is very very different from telling a stranger their parents don't love them.
this game is better with guys like him gone, we dont need that kind of crap encouraged or done in our games.

Just like with LegendaryLea. OHHHHHHHHHHHH

The joy if she got banned.

What threads are the most entertaining?  The ones where some toxic kid appeals his ban and gets schooled.

The shitstorms from banning streamers are like that x50

Ban more streamers imo.
Logged in just to upvote
Who the f cares about Meteos? Tyler was toxic AF and got what he deserved.
